headline: SocGen Leasing Arm Ayvens Said to Draw Blackstone Interest
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Ayvens SA, the French car-leasing business controlled by Societe Generale SA, is attracting takeover interest from investment firms including Blackstone Inc. after a slump in its shares, according to people familiar with the matter.
